page.title: 08FARMING IN WHARFEDALE
page.content: All the{farming}in the area is {livestock}and is mainly{dairy}or{sheep {farming.}All the farmers use good pedigree{Friesian cows.}Because of the {quota system}many farmers in the area have had to cut the size of their {herds}to accord with their{quota.}The {European Economic Community}have discovered that there is an excess of {milk}being produced and so every{dairy {farmer}is assigned a{quota.}Any{milk produced above the{quota}is either destroyed or the farmer has to pay to have it taken away.{Sheep farming}is also extensive, the most popular breeds being{Swaledale,Dales Bred}and {Masham.}This is a cross between {Swaledale}and{Teeswater}or {Wenslydale.}Animals are bought and sold at{Auction}in{Skipton,Hellifield or{Glusburn.
